title: Mijanur_Rahman
author: Mijanur_Rahman
content: WEBSITE                 TWITTER           TELEGRAM           BOUNTY GROUP 1. Bounty campaign will be managed by GR Bounty 2. 12K$ USD Worth of Minipepe coin are allocated for this Bounty.3. The bounty program was launched on 21.08.2023 and will run until 05.09.2023Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed, bounty manager reserves the right to make changes to the conditions at any time.MR Bounty team can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We are responsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity. Participating in this bounty campaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.1. All participants must join the MINIPEPE Netowark $KC official Telegram Group2. All participants must join MR Bounty Telegram Group3. Talking about the bounty in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group.Please ask your bounty-related questions in the GR Bounty 4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed.7. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Code:Proof of Authentication PostBitcointalk Username:Bitcointalk Profile Link:Telegram Username:Campaign Category Participated:Trust Wallet Address:Twitter 60%Telegram 40%Week 1: 21/28Week 2: 29/06Submit your weekly report on bounty thread.Rewards:1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 4 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow MiniPEPE Network $KC Twitter Page,2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new tweets or retweet 5 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweets/day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 10 hours minimum.5. Participants must use #MiniPEOE #Network #$KC #TT #TTChain hashtags in every retweet or tweet.Fill the registration form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf-AI-j67F0EuYhcuSfjjtNmqlUJxxUn9XIy8ZL5Lmauwt63w/viewform?usp=pp_urlRewards:5 stakes/weekRules:1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name |  MiniPEPE Network $KC.(Example: GR Bounty | MiniPEPE Network $KC )2. Replace your profile picture with MINIPEPE Network $KC Logo 3. Participants can only wear one project name at a time. Wearing more thanone project in your telegram name will disqualify you from the campaign.4. Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You mustFill the registration form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeMbrRFOepnw59mUGlF6dPk9KdUfBN1gnC-acCLjBkE0ul20A/viewform?usp=pp_url
